question: I divorced my wife after 9 months because Justice was not given to me. At the time of Divorce she was on her menses. I still want to be with her, where can I get Justice?
answer:
QUESTION
My in-laws broght 5 families at the time of Justice, between me and my wife. No one spoke anything about what Allah Says in Quraan and What prophet Muhammed (sws) have said. They all brougth American rules for me too live and I wanted to live According to Allah?s law, at the time I was seeking knowledge of Islam. I divorced my wife after 9 months because Justice was not given to me. At the time of Divorce she was on her menses. I still want to be with her, where can I get Justice?. What should I do? ..

We sympathise with you in your predicament. Our advice to you would be to take your case to the local Aalim and ask him to help you. The Imam of your local Masjid would be able to put you into contact with someone.
